column1: Topic title: PAS MP K jaan sengaja enggan turunkan harga kereta

column8: slowpoke newsKerajaan sengaja enggan turunkan harga kereta'oleh Dr Khairuddin Aman Razali, anggota parlimen Kuala Nerus dan Ketua Penerangan Dewan Ulama PASMkini 13 Apr 2017 SoS

Gerakan: Kurangkan cukai duti import kereta25 May 2017https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4300020...Ketua Pemuda Gerakan Tan Keng Liang berkata kerajaan seharusnya mengurangkan duti import kereta..."Selepas penjualan Proton kepada China, saya fikir langkah seterusnya adalah untuk mengurangkan duti import kereta....“Tiada lagi sebarang keperluan untuk melindungi Proton. Kereta harga murah untuk semua rakyat,” kata Tan.Government announce no more excise tax, After proton sold to china26 May 2017https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4302147...When government will announce this? ruffstuff sgshuhu krizalid88_real

Rakyat/CarBuyers contribution to auto industry25 Feb 2017https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4206663...Rakyat/Car Buyers contribution to auto industry:- estimated RM9 billion car taxes (2013) each year- so much so gomen will not abolish or reduce it- car loans (Nov 2016) worth estimated RM159.2 billion by banks- Insolvency Dept statistics: 1 in 4 cases of bankruptcy caused by car loans default
Car tax is 1 of the 3 highest income for this country. U think gov want to remove it? Even if they do, kompem gst up 20%
True... it's the G's cash cow. Milking till the last drop.

PKR MP: Hapuskan cukai duti eksais kereta30 May 2017https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4304502...Beliau berkata jika jualan itu bererti Proton bukan lagi kereta nasional, maka duti eksais secara prinsipnya perlu dikurangkan secara beransur-ansur dan dihapuskan dalam masa 3 hingga 5 tahun.
